Articles.Content:
This is a challenge where you can only use 3 types of parts. This doesn’t not exclude Command Pods, Prbe Cores or anything else. You may only use 3 types of parts. Certain parts will be scored better depending on situations. Look below:

Part Point (based on hat type of parts most used)

  • 0.625m parts: 20 points 
  • 1.25m parts: 10 points 
  • 2.5m parts: 5 points
  •  3.75m and 5m parts: 3 points

Planet/Moon Points (visiting a planet will require to at least enter its SOI and return/ comments and astroid just require the craft to touch the astroid or comet):

  • Mun: 10 points
  •  Minmus: 10 points
  • Duna: 15 points
  • Ike 15 points
  • Dres: 20 points
  • Jool: 30 points
  •  Jool Moons (individually): 25 points
  • Eeloo: 40 points
  •  Eve: 20 points
  • Gilly: 15 points
  •  Moho: 23 points
  • Astroid: 30 points
  •  Magic Astroid: 35 points
  •  Comet: 35 points
  • Interstellar comet: 40 points 

Gravity Pionts:

  • -1 G: -10 pionts
  • 1 G: 0 Pionts
  • 2 G: 2 pionts
  • 3 G: 3 points
  • 4 G: 4 points
  • 5 G: 5 points
  • 6G: 6 pionts
  • 7G: 7 pionts
  • 8 G: 8 pionts
  • 9 G: 9 pionys
  • 10 G: pionts

Easter Egg Pionts:

  • Extra 10 points

 

NOTICE! THEIS A PAERT LIMIT AND THAT LIMIT IS 10 PARTS!!!

 

Add these pionts together to get to your grand total. And if you can impress me. You will get an additional 1 point.

 

 

WINNERS:
1. (No first place winner)

2. (No second place winner)

3. (No third place winner)


 

 

please provide picture, videos, descriptions so I can count your pionts and confirm them. And also I just want to see what people biuld! I’m just interested.


 

 

*NOTICE! No modded parts. All stock parts including DLCs (DLCs allowed)

Edited January 19, 2021 by Dr. Kerbal
